existing_features.title: Redesign the initial profile setup popup (the required welcome dialog shown after first sign-in) to feel more polished and helpful while keeping the same functional gating behavior (cannot dismiss until a profile is created).

Improve the very first screen shown on app launch for unauthenticated users (the sign-in screen) with a more premium layout and clearer value proposition, without changing the Internet Identity login flow.

Apply a single coherent visual theme to the startup experience (sign-in + profile setup popup + loading states) with consistent styling (color accents, typography, and component rhythm). Avoid blue/purple as the primary accent.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve the initial popup/first screen that appears when the app starts (make it better UX/UI).
